name: Chomper Deluxe
description:
Chomper is a frenetic neo-retro videogame inspired by Jawbreaker (Atari 2600). Avoid the boulders, collect all the dots and advance to the next level.

Test your reflexes and skills in strategic pattern play to clear levels while trying to get a high score.

Powerups ! Grab them, eat the boulders and increase your score multiplier !

There are daily, weekly, monthly and all-time leaderboards, so there is a good chance to get your name in the top ten .. at least for a day :)

Featuring crazy retro arcade sounds, with awesome chiptunage by Clyde Shaffer ( http://soundcloud.com/clyde-shaffer ).

Supports most common gamepads.

An Android version for touchscreen devices is available on Google Play as a paid app or as an ad supported version.
